00028 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #include "ht32.h"
00030 #include "ht32_board.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup SYSTICK_Examples SYSTICK
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup DelayMicrosecond
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 
00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00048    Notice that the value of the preprocessor depends on the device.
00049 */
00050 #define TICK_OFFSET                               (13) // HT32F50231/50241
00051 //#define TICK_OFFSET                               (15) // HT32F52342/52352 (Branch Cache)
00052 
00053 #define TICK_US                                   (LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED / 1000000)
00054 
00055 /* Private macro -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00056 #define US2TICK(us)                               (us * TICK_US - TICK_OFFSET)
00057 
00058 #define delayMicroseconds(cnt)                    {SysTick->LOAD = cnt;\
00059                                                    SysTick->VAL = 0;\
00060                                                    while (SysTick->CTRL == 5);}
00061 
00062 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00063 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00064   * @brief  Main program.
00065   * @retval None
00066   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00067 int main(void)
00068 {
00069 
00070   { /* Enable peripheral clock                                                                              */
00071     CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00072     CKCUClock.Bit.PA = 1;
00073     CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00074   }
00075 
00076   GPIO_DirectionConfig(HTCFG_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00077 
00078   SYSTICK_ClockSourceConfig(SYSTICK_SRC_FCLK);
00079   SYSTICK_SetReloadValue(0x5);
00080   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR);
00081   SYSTICK_CounterCmd(SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE);
00082   SysTick->CTRL; // Fix the timing issue when using delayMicroseconds() for the first time
00083 
00084   HT_GPIOA->SRR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00085   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(1));
00086   HT_GPIOA->RR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00087   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(2));
00088   HT_GPIOA->SRR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00089   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(3));
00090   HT_GPIOA->RR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00091   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(4));
00092   HT_GPIOA->SRR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00093   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(5));
00094   HT_GPIOA->RR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00095   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(6));
00096   HT_GPIOA->SRR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00097   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(7));
00098   HT_GPIOA->RR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00099   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(8));
00100   HT_GPIOA->SRR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00101   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(9));
00102   HT_GPIOA->RR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00103   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(10));
00104   HT_GPIOA->SRR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00105   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(11));
00106   HT_GPIOA->RR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00107   delayMicroseconds(US2TICK(12));
00108   HT_GPIOA->SRR = HTCFG_GPIO_PIN;
00109 
00110   while (1)
00111   {
00112   }
00113 }
00114 
00115 #if (HT32_LIB_DEBUG == 1)
00116 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00117   * @brief  Report both the error name of the source file and the source line number.
00118   * @param  filename: pointer to the source file name.
00119   * @param  uline: error line source number.
00120   * @retval None
00121   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00122 void assert_error(u8* filename, u32 uline)
00123 {
00124   /*
00125      This function is called by IP library that the invalid parameters has been passed to the library API.
00126      Debug message can be added here.
00127      Example: printf("Parameter Error: file %s on line %d\r\n", filename, uline);
00128   */
00129 
00130   while (1)
00131   {
00132   }
00133 }
00134 #endif
